concept.title: Installing Additional Stages
concept.shortdesc: The includes a wide range of stages for pipeline development, but you might find a need for additional functionality.

conbody.p:
stagesinstalling additionalinstallationadditional stagesAt this time, you can install the following additional functionality:
Additional Functionality Description
Cassandra 2.1.5 Use to write to Cassandra version 2.1.5.
Provides a Cassandra destination.
CDH Kafka 1.2.0 (0.8.2.0) Use access the Cloudera version 1.2.0 distribution of Apache Kafka 0.8.2.0.
Provides a Kafka Consumer origin and Kafka Producer destination.
CDH 5.4.1 Cluster Kafka 1.2.0 Use to read from the Cloudera version 5.4.1 distribution of the Apache Kafka version 1.2.0.
Provides a Kafka Consumer origin.
cluster mode only.
CDH 5.3.2
CDH 5.4.1 Use to write to the Cloudera CDH versions 5.3.2 and 5.4.1 distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Provides the following destinations:
Flume
Hadoop FS
HBase
Solr
Elasticsearch 1.5.0 Use to write to Elasticsearch version 1.5.0.
Provides an Elasticsearch destination.
HDP 2.2.0 Use to write to the Hortonworks version 2.2.0 distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Provides the following destinations:
Flume
Hadoop FS
HBase
Jython 2.7.0 Use to process scripts written in Jython version 2.7.0.
Provides a Jython Evaluator processor.
Kinesis 1.2.1 Use to access Amazon Kinesis version 1.2.1.
Provides a Kinesis origin and destination.
conbody.draft-comment: Is this table missing anything? I assembled by looking at libraries and stage versions. I got a few additional stage versions from Brock that I didn't see in either place?
